name: places/ChIJO_RY3Yf2wokRHfo40SoOcUQ
adrFormatAddress: 3660 Broadway, New York, NY 10031-1536, USA

originalText.text: Ordered the chopped cheese hero! Delicious. Two blocks from the apartment. $4.50 large $3.50 roll size. Can't complain.

text.text: Ordered the chopped cheese hero! Delicious. Two blocks from the apartment. $4.50 large $3.50 roll size. Can't complain.

originalText.text:
They were so nice here!

Answered the phone right away—I didn’t order food, just some grocery items, but their service was stellar and I’ll definitely be calling for delivery from here again.

My order came quite quickly and directly to my door.

Very nice employee who answered the phone and took my order as well!

I see they have smoothies—my only suggestion to them is to expand your menu to add vegetable smoothies as well, as I would surely order.

Thanks for the great and prompt service!

originalText.text: FYI:  This is no longer a deli—it is a smoke shop—they do NOT have a hot grill nor offer sandwiches etc prepared items—they sell cigarettes, THC and CBD products of varying quality as well as minor grocery items such as bottled water, milk, crackers, etc.  The selection of grocery items is small but okay for a bodega delivery usually speedy if and when they offer it—best is you can actually call this store and not bother w having to use some third party delivery service like door dash or GrubHub they just send “their guy.”

originalText.text: Only went in to grab a few items. This place has been here a good couple years now and they have some nice staff. Some staff need to work on their customer service more. There are times they will forget your order and/or send something you did not ask for. But most times they will send the delivery person back with what you wanted.

text.text: Only went in to grab a few items. This place has been here a good couple years now and they have some nice staff. Some staff need to work on their customer service more. There are times they will forget your order and/or send something you did not ask for. But most times they will send the delivery person back with what you wanted.

originalText.text: The food was good. The chef however, had no idea what costed what, but that's not his fault. The manager was all over the place and left the store unnatended and I had to wait in order to pay for my food. They had no honey mustard and used containers from McDonald's for the sandwiches. They need to get it together.
